# miniCRAN

R package to create internally consistent, mini version of CRAN

## why?

* private packages
* works with packrat

---

# Example

```{r example, eval=FALSE, echo=TRUE}
library("miniCRAN")
makeRepo(
    pkgs = pkgs,
    path = "/home/pi/CRANberryPi"
)
```

---

```{r}
available.packages(repos = "10.0.1.110")
```
